subSections.title: Readings
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|さく}}

# [[plan]]; [[policy]]
#: 正直は決して最上の'''策'''ではない。
#:: ''Shoujiki wa kesshite saijou no '''saku''' de wa nai.''
#:: Honesty is never the best policy.
# the fifth of the [[w:Eight Principles of Yong|Eight Principles of Yong]]

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|策を講ずる|さく を こうずる}}
* {{ja-r|策を施す|さく を ほどこす}}

subSections.title: Hypernyms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|永字八法|えいじ はっぽう|the [[w:Eight Principles of Yong|Eight Principles of Yong]]}}
